long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ParaCyberBellum PyRASP Agent - Provides sites specific security header and browser update level to the PyRASP agent of protected Web Applications.
Every request sent by the browser to the server specified in the extension configuration is enriched with a specific header (customized by the user) containing a secret shared key and an information if the browser is in the latest available version.
